item.title: [317 DELTA] Need help with small snippet
item.dc:creator: @MoreWeed MoreWeed
item.description:
@MoreWeed wrote:

what i thought would happen with this is, when you click the object, the item in your inventory is destroyed if its there and you are given 10k gp. if not presented with a message.

however nothing seems to happen

could someone show me what im doing wrong?

here what i have

if(objectID == 2452){ if (playerHasItem(1436)) { deleteItem(1436, 1); addItem(995, 10000); } else { sM("You dont have any esssence."); } }

any help would be great

thanks

EDIT: FIXED
